column3: Filling in a RED(starred ingame) cell gains 2 BP. Completing a category for a single Zone gains 5 BP and a Figure. Completing a category across all five zones gains 16 BP. Completing an entire Zone gains 32 BP and a Probe.
column8: Bold items can be found anywhere in the Zone
